revision.text:
<languages/> <translate>
<!--T:1--> This page is meant for translators to find the current glossary that's been agreed on.
<!--T:2--> ==Currencies== * Pokédollars: * Dungeon Tokens: * Farm Points: * Quest Points:
<!--T:3--> ==Hatch stuff== * To Hatch: * Haching/Breeding: </br> * Hatchery Queue: * Breeding Efficiency: * Hatchery Helpers:
<!--T:4--> ==Farm stuff== * Aura: * Seed Stage: * Sprout Stage: * Taller Stage: * Bloom Stage: * Ripe Stage: * Wither: * Berry Master: * Wandering Pokémon:
<!--T:5--> ==Underground stuff== * Tile: * Dig Deeper: * Gem case: * Shards:
<!--T:6--> ==Regions== * Shop Pokémon: * Roaming Pokémon: * Key Items: * Oak Items: * Town map: * Weather: * Shiny:
<!--T:7--> ==NPCs and Trainers== * Fan Club Chairman: * Youngster: * Researcher: * Hiker: * Bug Buds: * Melded Minds: * Bookworms:
<!--T:8--> ==Dungeon== * Encounter Tables: * Wild Encounters: * Boss Encounters: * No Debuff: * Debuff Drop Table: * "It has x tiles arranged in a NxN square, including x chest tiles, x non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.": </translate>
